brainly_data.question: Inez waters her plants every two days. She Trims Them Every 15 days. She did both today. When will she do both again ?
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: Inez waters her plants every two days. She Trims Them Every 15 days. She did both today. When will she do both again ?
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text: The correct answer is that Inez will both water and trim her plants within the same day in 30 days, because the lowest common multiple of 2 and 15 is 30.

top_answer.text: The correct answer is that Inez will both water and trim her plants within the same day in 30 days, because the lowest common multiple of 2 and 15 is 30.
